PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcat:distribution ?dist .
		?dist a dcat:Distribution .
		?dist dcat:mediaType ?media .
		?dist dcterms:format ?format .
		?dist dgov:mediaType ?ftype .
		?dist dcat:accessURL ?page .
		?dist dcterms:language ?lang }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset a dcat:Dataset .
		?dataset dcterms:identifier ?id .
		?dataset dcterms:language ?lang .
		BIND(IRI(CONCAT('http://data.gov.be/dist/bxlcity/', ?id, '/', ?media)) as ?dist)
		VALUES (?media ?ftype ?format) {
			( "csv" <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/1> <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/CSV> )
			( "json" <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/9> <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/JSON> )
			( "xls" <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/8> <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/XLS> )
		}
		VALUES (?lang ?prefix) {
			( <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/iso639-1/nl> "http://opendata.brussel.be" )
			( <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/iso639-1/fr> "http://opendata.bruxelles.be" )
			( <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/iso639-1/en> "http://opendata.brussels.be" )
		}
	}
